00:00:01:110000.Speaker: Raj
00:00:01:110000.Dialogue: I'm telling you, if xenon emits then those dark matter  discoveries must be wrong.

00:00:06:100000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:06:100000.Dialogue: Yes, well, if we lived in a world where slow-moving xenon produced light, then you'd be correct. Also, pigs would fly, my derriere would produce cotton candy, and The Phantom Menace would be a timeless classic.

00:00:18:160000.Speaker: Raj
00:00:18:160000.Dialogue: Oh, you're so arrogant. If you were a superhero, your name would be Captain Arrogant. And you know what your superpower would be? Arrogance.

00:00:26:150000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:26:150000.Dialogue: You're wrong again. If my superpower were arrogance, my name would be Dr. Arroganto.

00:00:34:170000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:34:170000.Dialogue: I love watching Raj and Sheldon try to work together.

00:00:37:210000.Speaker: Leonard
00:00:37:210000.Dialogue: Yeah, it's like if Alien and Predator decided to go partners in a Jamba Juice.

00:00:43:070000.Speaker: Raj
00:00:43:070000.Dialogue: Has it occurred to you you're missing the big picture? If you look at neutron scattering data...

00:00:48:080000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:00:48:080000.Dialogue: Nothing. I just wanted to make Raj stop talking.

00:00:52:100000.Speaker: Howard
00:00:52:100000.Dialogue: (whispering) No, no, no. He won. Suck it up.

00:00:55:230000.Speaker: Penny
00:00:55:230000.Dialogue: Well, I'd ask you guys if you want dessert, but I know Sheldon doesn't eat dessert on Tuesdays. And even if Raj wanted something, he couldn't tell me. Howard won't order anything, but he will come up with some sort of skeevy comment involving the words pie or cheesecake. And Leonard's lactose intolerant, so he can't eat anything here without his intestines blowing up like a balloon animal.

00:01:14:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:14:120000.Dialogue: Hang on a second. I could have the fruit platter.

00:01:24:020000.Speaker: Penny
00:01:24:020000.Dialogue: Oh, Howard, heads up. Your ex-girlfriend just came in for her shift.

00:01:28:120000.Speaker: Leonard
00:01:28:120000.Dialogue: When was the last time you saw her?

00:01:30:080000.Speaker: Howard
00:01:30:080000.Dialogue: Oh, not since we broke up. Wow. How am I going to play this? Sophisticated and relaxed? Friendly, noncommittal? Cold and distant?

00:01:43:150000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:01:43:150000.Speaker: Bernadette

00:01:45:020000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:01:45:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:01:45:020000.Dialogue: Hello. I see you decided to go with pathetic and frightened.

00:01:51:010000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:01:51:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:01:51:010000.Dialogue: It's one of his best moves.

00:02:38:210000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:38:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:02:38:210000.Dialogue: So, my dear, we meet again.

00:02:44:070000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:44:070000.Dialogue: Hello, Howard. (soft laugh) I've missed you.

00:02:47:120000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:47:120000.Speaker: Howard

00:02:51:090000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:51:090000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff

00:02:53:170000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:53:170000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:02:53:170000.Dialogue: Why am I wearing my Battlestar Galactica flight suit in bed?

00:02:57:050000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:02:57:050000.Speaker: Howard
00:02:57:050000.Dialogue: Why are you in bed with me? If we start to question this, it all falls apart.

00:03:04:030000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:04:030000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:03:04:030000.Dialogue: Sorry. Oh, ravish me, Howard. My loins ache for you.

00:03:11:190000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:11:190000.Speaker: Howard

00:03:15:080000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:15:080000.Speaker: Mrs Wolowitz (off)
00:03:15:080000.Dialogue: MRS. WOLOWITZ: Howard, have you seen my girdle?!

00:03:18:200000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:18:200000.Speaker: Howard

00:03:20:110000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:20:110000.Speaker: Mrs Wolowitz
00:03:20:110000.Dialogue: I can't find it, and I'm late for my Weight Watchers meeting!

00:03:23:220000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:23:220000.Speaker: Howard
00:03:23:220000.Dialogue: Maybe it committed suicide! Leave me alone! Now, where were we?

00:03:31:070000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:31:070000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:03:31:070000.Dialogue: I believe you were about to rip off my uniform with your teeth.

00:03:36:030000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:36:030000.Speaker: Howard
00:03:36:030000.Dialogue: Bernadette?! What are you doing here?

00:03:39:010000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:39:010000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:03:39:010000.Dialogue: Well, if I had to guess, I'd say I'm here because you saw me earlier this evening, and you're still hung up on me.

00:03:44:070000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:44:070000.Speaker: Howard

00:03:45:120000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:45:120000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff

00:03:49:140000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:49:140000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:03:49:140000.Dialogue: Otherwise, based on past experience, we'd be done by now.

00:03:54:210000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:54:210000.Speaker: Howard
00:03:54:210000.Dialogue: Okay, I'm a little confused here.

00:03:57:100000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:03:57:100000.Speaker: George Takei
00:03:57:100000.Dialogue: GEORGE TAKEI: Oh, my. Can I help?

00:04:03:010000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:03:010000.Speaker: Howard

00:04:05:140000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:05:140000.Speaker: Bernadette

00:04:07:100000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:07:100000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:04:07:100000.Dialogue: Howard, do you have latent homosexual tendencies?

00:04:10:000000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:10:000000.Speaker: Howard

00:04:12:010000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:12:010000.Speaker: George Takei
00:04:12:010000.Dialogue: So you say. Yet, here I am.

00:04:18:100000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:18:100000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:04:18:100000.Dialogue: George, let me ask you something. How did you deal with being typecast as a science fiction icon?

00:04:23:150000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:23:150000.Speaker: George Takei
00:04:23:150000.Dialogue: It's difficult. You try and stretch as an actor-- do Strindberg, O'Neill, but all they want is, Course laid in, Captain.

00:04:32:130000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:32:130000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:04:32:130000.Dialogue: Tell me about it. It's frackin' frustrating.

00:04:37:020000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:37:020000.Speaker: Howard
00:04:37:020000.Dialogue: Wait. Katee, why are you leaving?

00:04:39:080000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:39:080000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:04:39:080000.Dialogue: She's leaving because you really want to be with me.

00:04:42:070000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:42:070000.Speaker: Mrs Wolowitz
00:04:42:070000.Dialogue: MRS. WOLOWITZ: Howard, I found my girdle! It was in the dryer!

00:04:47:130000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:47:130000.Speaker: Howard

00:04:49:060000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:49:060000.Speaker: Mrs Wolowitz
00:04:49:060000.Dialogue: I think it shrunk! I'm spilling out like the Pillsbury Doughboy here!

00:04:55:000000.Scene: Howard’s bedroom. Howard enters in a silk dressing gown, puts on romantic music and sets up mood lighting. Gets onto bed.
00:04:55:000000.Speaker: Howard
00:04:55:000000.Dialogue: And with that mental picture, I think we're done for the evening.

00:05:05:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:05:080000.Dialogue: You know, you never told me what happened between you and Bernadette.

00:05:12:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:05:12:190000.Dialogue: It was the kind of thing that makes it kind of hard to face her now.

00:05:16:200000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:16:200000.Dialogue: That covers anything from farting in bed to killing a homeless guy. Oh, my God. You ran over a hobo.

00:05:28:140000.Speaker: Leonard
00:05:28:140000.Dialogue: All right, fine. So you want to get back together with her, but you're too ashamed to face her because of whatever it is you did.

00:05:42:220000.Speaker: Howard
00:05:42:220000.Dialogue: Now, you see, I don't know if you're kidding or not.

00:05:46:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:05:46:220000.Dialogue: You're being unreasonable. Why can't I have a desk?!

00:05:51:060000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:05:51:060000.Dialogue: Our collaboration is a work of the mind. We don't need desks.

00:06:00:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:06:00:080000.Dialogue: Why can't he have a desk, Sheldon?

00:06:02:020000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:02:020000.Dialogue: Oh, Lord, will this day never end? As I've explained repeatedly to Dr. Koothrappali, whose ability to comprehend the American idiom fails him when it's convenient, there's absolutely no money in my budget for additional office furniture.

00:06:14:210000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:14:210000.Dialogue: Oh, but there's money for a drawer full of Red Vines, a marshmallow shooting rifle, and a super executive ant farm with glow-in-the-dark sand?

00:06:26:060000.Speaker: Howard
00:06:26:060000.Dialogue: Okay, what if he buys his own desk?

00:06:27:220000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:27:220000.Dialogue: Yeah, what if I buy my own desk?

00:06:45:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:06:45:010000.Dialogue: And I can put it in your office?

00:06:46:190000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:46:190000.Dialogue: Well, you really want to dot the I's and cross the T's, don't you?

00:06:51:130000.Speaker: Leonard
00:06:51:130000.Dialogue: Why would you want a glow-in-the-dark ant farm?

00:06:53:030000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:06:53:030000.Dialogue: They do some of their best work at night.

00:07:01:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:01:180000.Speaker: Penny

00:07:05:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:05:190000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:07:15:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:15:120000.Speaker: Sheldon

00:07:20:160000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:20:160000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:20:160000.Dialogue: Would you have opened the door if you knew it was me?

00:07:23:070000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:23:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:23:070000.Dialogue: Not since I found out the teddy bear you gave me had a webcam in it.

00:07:27:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:27:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:27:190000.Dialogue: I just have a question. Does Bernadette ever talk about me?

00:07:33:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:33:020000.Speaker: Penny

00:07:34:010000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:34:010000.Speaker: Howard

00:07:38:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:38:190000.Speaker: Howard

00:07:41:050000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:41:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:41:050000.Dialogue: Oh, no, not at first. Right after I pointed it out.

00:07:44:080000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:44:080000.Speaker: Howard
00:07:44:080000.Dialogue: Let me ask you something else. Is she seeing anybody?

00:07:48:060000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:48:060000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:48:060000.Dialogue: Oh, not that I know of. Hey, while we're on the subject, why did you guys break up anyway?

00:07:52:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:52:190000.Speaker: Howard

00:07:54:210000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:54:210000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:54:210000.Dialogue: Howard, if you want my help, I've got to know what happened.

00:07:57:020000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:57:020000.Speaker: Howard

00:07:58:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:07:58:150000.Speaker: Penny
00:07:58:150000.Dialogue: Yeah, that's what I'm counting on. Spill.

00:08:02:100000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:02:100000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:02:100000.Dialogue: Okay. Well, you know World of Warcraft?

00:08:05:210000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:05:210000.Speaker: Penny

00:08:07:130000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:07:130000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:07:130000.Dialogue: Well, did you know that the characters in the game can have sex with each other?

00:08:14:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:14:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:08:14:040000.Dialogue: Oh, God. I think I see where this is going.

00:08:18:010000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:18:010000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:18:010000.Dialogue: Her name was Glissinda the Troll.

00:08:22:140000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:22:140000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:22:140000.Dialogue: Bernadette walked in on me while we were doing the cyber-nasty under the Bridge of Souls.

00:08:28:220000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:28:220000.Speaker: Penny
00:08:28:220000.Dialogue: (laughs) Oh, you're right. That is so embarrassing.

00:08:32:230000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:32:230000.Speaker: Howard

00:08:35:030000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:35:030000.Speaker: Penny

00:08:37:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:37:040000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:37:040000.Dialogue: Bernadette. She was so mad at me, she wouldn't even listen to my side of the story.

00:08:41:190000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:41:190000.Speaker: Penny

00:08:43:060000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:43:060000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:43:060000.Dialogue: Well, for all we know, Glissinda the Troll wasn't even a real woman. I mean, she could've been a 50-year-old truck driver in New Jersey.

00:08:50:180000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:50:180000.Speaker: Penny
00:08:50:180000.Dialogue: Really? And that didn't make her feel better?

00:08:54:110000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:54:110000.Speaker: Howard
00:08:54:110000.Dialogue: Will you talk to her, see if there's any chance at all we could get back together?

00:08:59:100000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:08:59:100000.Speaker: Penny
00:08:59:100000.Dialogue: Oh, gee, Howard, I really don't want to get in the middle of this.

00:09:02:120000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:02:120000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:02:120000.Dialogue: No. Why would you? I'm just another lonely nerd, living with his mother, trying to find any scrap of happiness he can. You know, maybe to make up for the fact that his dad left him when he was 11.

00:09:16:070000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:16:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:09:16:070000.Dialogue: Okay, I will think about it.

00:09:18:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:18:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:18:150000.Dialogue: You know, I've always blamed myself for him leaving. I always thought it was because I wasn't the son he wanted.

00:09:26:040000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:26:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:09:26:040000.Dialogue: Yeah, I said I'd think about it.

00:09:27:150000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:27:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:09:27:150000.Dialogue: I wasn't athletic, yeah, I was kind of sickly...

00:09:30:050000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:30:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:09:30:050000.Dialogue: Okay, fine. Look, look, I'm calling her now! See?!

00:09:32:210000.Scene: Penny’s apartment. Penny is gathering laundry.
00:09:32:210000.Speaker: Howard

00:09:37:180000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:37:180000.Dialogue: So anyway, Howard asked Penny to talk to Bernadette, and she did, and Bernadette agreed to meet him for a cup of coffee.

00:09:45:030000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:09:45:030000.Dialogue: Why on earth are you telling me all this?

00:09:47:220000.Speaker: Leonard
00:09:47:220000.Dialogue: I don't know. Sometimes your movements are so lifelike, I forget you're not a real boy.

00:10:15:000000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:15:000000.Dialogue: You said I could buy a desk.

00:10:16:190000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:16:190000.Dialogue: This isn't a desk. This is a... Brobdingnagian monstrosity.

00:10:22:200000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:22:200000.Dialogue: Is that the American idiom for "giant, big-ass desk"?

00:10:30:130000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:30:130000.Dialogue: Can you say it again for me?

00:10:44:010000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:44:010000.Dialogue: How did you even get it in here?

00:10:45:200000.Speaker: Raj
00:10:45:200000.Dialogue: That's for me, Ramon, Julio, Jesus and Rodrigo to know and you to find out.

00:10:50:170000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:10:50:170000.Dialogue: All right, you've made your point. A fine prank, very amusing. (fake laugh) Now get it out.

00:11:07:150000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:07:150000.Dialogue: All right, if you're not going to remove it, I'll remove it for you.

00:11:33:120000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:33:120000.Dialogue: Why do you even want this here? Its size is completely disproportionate to its purpose.

00:11:39:170000.Speaker: Raj
00:11:39:170000.Dialogue: Well, seeing as its purpose was to piss you off, I'd say it's spot-on.

00:11:46:080000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:46:080000.Dialogue: All right, I see what's going on. This is the opening salvo in what will be an escalating series of juvenile tit-for-tat exchanges. Well titted.

00:11:58:230000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:11:58:230000.Dialogue: Stand by for my upcoming tat.

00:12:04:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:12:04:010000.Dialogue: No. See what I did there? I turned it around.

00:12:14:010000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:12:14:010000.Dialogue: Sorry, I had to clock out.

00:12:16:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:12:16:150000.Dialogue: Oh, no, that's okay. (clears throat) How have you been?

00:12:20:020000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:12:20:020000.Dialogue: Okay. You know, busy, schoolwork. You?

00:12:23:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:12:23:190000.Dialogue: Same. I took a scuba-diving course over the summer, but it turns out I'm terrified of the ocean.

00:12:32:000000.Speaker: Howard
00:12:32:000000.Dialogue: You wouldn't know anybody who wants to buy a wet suit, boy's large?

00:12:37:130000.Speaker: Howard
00:12:37:130000.Dialogue: Yeah, forget it. Not important. (clears throat) So, are you seeing anyone?

00:12:49:040000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:49:040000.Dialogue: Are you gonna want to order food?

00:12:54:210000.Speaker: Penny
00:12:54:210000.Dialogue: That's what I told him when he asked me. I hope that's not out of line.

00:12:58:150000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:12:58:150000.Dialogue: No, it's fine. Penny, can we have a little privacy?

00:13:05:170000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:13:05:170000.Dialogue: What about you, have you been seeing anybody?

00:13:09:080000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:09:080000.Dialogue: Well, you know how it is with guys. I mean, we have needs and...

00:13:13:070000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:13:13:070000.Dialogue: So you've been seeing other girls?

00:13:23:050000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:23:050000.Dialogue: You know, you look thirsty. I brought you some iced tea.

00:13:26:100000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:26:100000.Dialogue: It's passion fruit, new on the menu.

00:13:31:140000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:31:140000.Dialogue: Yeah, you're right. Doy. So, Howard, trolls: yay or nay?

00:13:35:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:35:180000.Dialogue: Isn't there somewhere else you can be?

00:13:38:070000.Speaker: Penny
00:13:38:070000.Dialogue: Not where I can hear you guys.

00:13:42:130000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:42:130000.Dialogue: Okay, fine. I'll admit, there are dark, sordid little corners of the Internet where the name Wolowizard is whispered in hushed tones.

00:13:53:190000.Speaker: Howard
00:13:53:190000.Dialogue: The only reason I go there, the only reason I've ever gone there is because I don't have a real woman in my life. You happy?

00:14:02:160000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:02:160000.Dialogue: Yeah, that'll hold me for a while.

00:14:07:060000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:14:07:060000.Dialogue: Howard, you did have a real woman. I was right there in the next room while you were clicking that troll's brains out.

00:14:16:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:16:200000.Dialogue: Yeah, but we weren't... (laughs) I-I mean, you and I never...

00:14:27:100000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:27:100000.Dialogue: You enjoy. Never had sex? Wow.

00:14:31:180000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:31:180000.Dialogue: What do you mean, whose fault was that?

00:14:34:150000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:14:34:150000.Dialogue: Well, we could've been having sex, but you never made the move.

00:14:37:150000.Speaker: Howard
00:14:37:150000.Dialogue: I didn't think you wanted me to make the move.

00:14:40:030000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:14:40:030000.Dialogue: Howard, a girl doesn't go out with a man like you, with your looks, your fancy patter and your tight hoochie pants if she's not expecting him to eventually make the move.

00:14:56:170000.Speaker: Penny
00:14:56:170000.Dialogue: Hey, this is a little awkward, but my manager says I can't actually give nachos away. So... just take that when you're ready.

00:15:07:100000.Speaker: Howard
00:15:07:100000.Dialogue: Yeah, we had a really great talk, and we're gonna start seeing each other again.

00:15:11:150000.Speaker: Leonard
00:15:11:150000.Dialogue: Oh, congratulations. Have you broken it to the troll yet?

00:15:16:020000.Speaker: Howard
00:15:16:020000.Dialogue: Did Penny tell you about that?

00:15:19:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:15:19:200000.Dialogue: The greasy old fat guy in Facilities Management?

00:15:29:010000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:29:010000.Dialogue: KOOTHRAPPALI: Sorry, dude, the thermostat's on my side of the room, so it stays Mumbai hot in here until you turn off that stupid Indian music!

00:15:37:010000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:15:37:010000.Dialogue: SHELDON: I'll turn off the music when you get rid of that salmonella-ridden parakeet!

00:15:41:030000.Speaker: Raj
00:15:41:030000.Dialogue: Oh, too bad! Sheldon's pathologically afraid of birds! Hey, look, Sheldon! Birdie, birdie, birdie!

00:15:47:160000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:15:47:160000.Dialogue: That's it! Prepare for marshmallow death!

00:16:01:230000.Speaker: Leonard
00:16:01:230000.Dialogue: So anyway... That's great news about you and Bernadette.

00:16:06:050000.Speaker: Howard
00:16:06:050000.Dialogue: Yeah. I think I'm gonna take her to miniature golf.

00:16:08:170000.Speaker: Leonard
00:16:08:170000.Dialogue: Ah. Well, I guess for you guys that's like regular golf.

00:16:12:200000.Speaker: Howard
00:16:12:200000.Dialogue: Short jokes? Really? You're, like, a quarter of an inch taller than me.

00:16:17:080000.Speaker: Leonard
00:16:17:080000.Dialogue: Yeah, and don't you forget it.

00:16:33:120000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:16:33:120000.Dialogue: All right, now a little tongue.

00:16:38:060000.Speaker: George Takei
00:16:38:060000.Dialogue: We've only just rekindled the romance. Let's not sully the moment with the exchange of saliva.

00:16:46:180000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:16:46:180000.Dialogue: Don't listen to him. She wants it. Tongue. (wiggling tongue): La, la, la, la, la.

00:17:02:040000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:17:02:040000.Dialogue: Trust me, she's ready. Make the move.

00:17:05:080000.Speaker: George Takei
00:17:05:080000.Dialogue: No, no, no. A lady wants to be wooed, courted slowly.

00:17:18:210000.Speaker: Katee Sackhoff
00:17:18:210000.Dialogue: Listen to me, Howard, it's time. Make the move, now.

00:17:32:000000.Speaker: Bernadette
00:17:32:000000.Dialogue: Oh, not now. We're starting a new relationship. I need to get to know you again.

00:17:36:110000.Speaker: Howard
00:17:36:110000.Dialogue: No, you don't. (laughs) It's me. The lusty charmer with the fancy patter and the hoochie pants.

00:18:01:140000.Speaker: Leonard
00:18:01:140000.Dialogue: Oh, God, what's that smell? Oh-ho-hoo!

00:18:09:220000.Speaker: Leonard
00:18:09:220000.Dialogue: What are you doing in there?

00:18:12:090000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:18:12:090000.Dialogue: I'm making hydrogen sulfide and ammonia gas. Just a little experiment in pest control.

00:18:19:110000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:19:110000.Dialogue: KOOTHRAPPALI: It's not gonna work, dude; I grew up in India-- an entire subcontinent where cows walk in the street, and nobody has ever had a solid bowel movement.

00:18:27:120000.Speaker: Sheldon
00:18:27:120000.Dialogue: Well, we'll just see how long you can hold out.

00:18:30:200000.Speaker: Raj
00:18:30:200000.Dialogue: Well, we'll just see how your noxious gas fares against my cinnamon- apple-scented aroma therapy candles.

00:18:37:170000.Speaker: Leonard
00:18:37:170000.Dialogue: Didn't you say you're making hydrogen sulfide gas?
